subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Jets’ Brad Smith has rooted his young N.F.L. career in the joy that comes from being a part of a team’s success, and in many ways symbolizes a sudden synthesis on the team.
snippet: The Jets’ Brad Smith has rooted his young N.F.L. career in the joy that comes from being a part of a team’s success, and in many ways symbolizes a sudden synthesis on the team.
